item.title: Backyard Inspiration
item.description: We’ve been making good progress in our backyard so far. Our new ‘cabana’ is built and the landscaping is mostly complete!

item.title: Hidden Tank Fire Table Roundup
item.description: I’ve been searching for the perfect fire table for our backyard, especially right now when the weather is chilly and we still want to enjoy our back patio.
